FIND (FUN)
FIND (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION FIND : UDINT
Searches for the position of a partial string within a string.
The find is index based, to search from first position
udiStart
:=
0
Return value also returns index of the found rune, e.g. for found first rune it returns
0
